server - package server
 
server - Variable in class server.GuiServer
 
Server - Class in server
The server runs an infinite loop to keep accepting incoming requests When a request comes, it assigns a new thread to handle the communication part The server also stores the client name into an ArrayList , to keep a track of connected devices.

we create a helper class for handling various requests.
